0.8.2 2019-12-20
----------------

- Do not check the terminal at startup for the Windows version — so it
  can be used in a continuous integration environment.

------------------

- Port to Dune.
- Upgrade to OPAM 2.0.

0.8 — 2017-11-08
----------------

- Only use escape sequences or Windows calls when the stdout or stderr
  is a TTY. (issue #1).
- Port to jbuilder
